body: Hi all, Maybe I am missing something but can you do these kind of realistic renderings through Honeybee. If so how? Thanks! Radiance false color[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/H9E9iJBHqZMYkT*zy*7pi1Q7j1AzhIrts3EFg2IW0jqCkKSwYngKFcsYuhpPhrdXhvp4EOvGJ6jQwYLfQCABzSAUk*SMHwaR/Radiancefalsecolor.JPG)[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/H9E9iJBHqZMxg99X53lzD7Ri*ic6V3Vjm6*MmHSKuEzYZcfY9m8BePEiMsoSI*IYF*uNqQHSzwm3a6b6rHE-UpjKV6GEJesU/Radiancegridview.JPG) Daylight results overlayed ontop realistic rendering [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/H9E9iJBHqZOK4i1klGGbqeiCmjarWDYYRI4uhtdlZ0iiA*fNSRWkcn242GV*zaPcUDTQaxqn1gu8tLag6MfCGbXfKwPGLkB8/Radiancegridview.JPG)
